label.description: The name of the action. This is displayed to the user.

label-localized.description: Localized version of the "label" property. If nothing is provided, the "label" property is used instead.

description.description: A longer description of the action. This is displayed to the user.

description-localized.description: Localized version of the "description" property. If nothing is provided, the "description" property is used instead.

schema.description: The schema of the action. This is used to validate the action parameters as well as auto-generate a GUI for the action.
